Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson hit a go-ahead two-run homer
Post-Match Reflections: Cooper Criswell stood by his manager
Miscellaneous Highlights: The defeat dropped the Red Sox 4 1/2 games back in the AL Wild Card standings
Others: The Red Sox struggled at the plate over the last 10 games
Zack Kelly gave up a two-run homer to Riley Greene in the sixth
